ResourceHeader.Description:
Military imaging spacecraft series that also measure downward particle fluxes, 
	  magnetic fields, electron densities, ion drifts, and provide visible light images on the 
	  different spacecraft near the Earth. Spacecraft are in sun-synchronous polar orbits at 
	  830 km altitude crossing the polar regions 
	  in either the dawn dusk direction or the pre-noon pre-midnight direction.

InformationURL.Name: Wikipedia Article
InformationURL.Description: Detailed Information about the Defense Meteorological Satellite Program
